00033 void
00034 MaintenancePrioritizerLogCleanup::prioritize(RangeStatsVector &range_data,
00035                                              int64_t memory_needed,
00036                                              String &trace_str) {
00037   RangeStatsVector range_data_root;
00038   RangeStatsVector range_data_metadata;
00039   RangeStatsVector range_data_user;
00040 
00041   for (size_t i=0; i<range_data.size(); i++) {
00042     if (range_data[i]->range->is_root())
00043       range_data_root.push_back(range_data[i]);
00044     else if (range_data[i]->table_id == 0)
00045       range_data_metadata.push_back(range_data[i]);
00046     else
00047       range_data_user.push_back(range_data[i]);
00048   }
00049 
00050 
00054   if (!range_data_root.empty())
00055     assign_priorities(range_data_root, Global::root_log,
00056                       Global::log_prune_threshold_min, trace_str);
00057 
00058 
00062   if (!range_data_metadata.empty())
00063     assign_priorities(range_data_metadata, Global::metadata_log,
00064                       Global::log_prune_threshold_min, trace_str);
00065 
00066 
00070   int64_t prune_threshold = (int64_t)(m_stats.mbps() * (double)Global::log_prune_threshold_max);
00071 
00072   if (prune_threshold < Global::log_prune_threshold_min)
00073     prune_threshold = Global::log_prune_threshold_min;
00074   else if (prune_threshold > Global::log_prune_threshold_max)
00075     prune_threshold = Global::log_prune_threshold_max;
00076 
00077   trace_str += String("STATS user log prune threshold\t") + prune_threshold + "\n";
00078 
00079   if (!range_data_user.empty())
00080     assign_priorities(range_data_user, Global::user_log, prune_threshold, trace_str);
00081 
00082 }

00085 
00086 void
00087 MaintenancePrioritizerLogCleanup::assign_priorities(RangeStatsVector &stats,
00088               CommitLog *log, int64_t prune_threshold, String &trace_str) {
00089   CommitLog::CumulativeSizeMap cumulative_size_map;
00090   CommitLog::CumulativeSizeMap::iterator iter;
00091   AccessGroup::MaintenanceData *ag_data;
00092   int64_t disk_total, mem_total;
00093 
00094   log->load_cumulative_size_map(cumulative_size_map);
00095 
00096   for (size_t i=0; i<stats.size(); i++) {
00097 
00098     if (stats[i]->busy)
00099       continue;
00100 
00101     if (stats[i]->state == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED ||
00102         stats[i]->state == RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK) {
00103       HT_INFOF("Adding maintenance for range %s because mid-split(%d)",
00104                stats[i]->range->get_name().c_str(), stats[i]->state);
00105       stats[i]->needs_split = true;
00106       stats[i]->priority = 3000;
00107       continue;
00108     }
00109 
00110     disk_total = 0;
00111     mem_total = 0;
00112 
00113     for (ag_data = stats[i]->agdata; ag_data; ag_data = ag_data->next) {
00114 
00115       if (!ag_data->in_memory &&
00116           ag_data->mem_used > Global::access_group_max_mem) {
00117         stats[i]->priority = Math::log2(ag_data->mem_used);
00118         stats[i]->needs_compaction = true;
00119         ag_data->ag->set_compaction_bit();
00120       }
00121 
00122       disk_total += ag_data->disk_used;
00123 
00124       if (ag_data->earliest_cached_revision == TIMESTAMP_NULL ||
00125           ag_data->earliest_cached_revision == TIMESTAMP_MAX)
00126         continue;
00127 
00128       iter = cumulative_size_map.lower_bound(ag_data->earliest_cached_revision);
00129 
00130       if (iter == cumulative_size_map.end()) {
00131         String errstr;
00132         for (iter = cumulative_size_map.begin(); iter != cumulative_size_map.end(); iter++) {
00133           errstr += String("PERROR frag-") + (*iter).second.fragno +
00134             "\trevision\t" + (*iter).first + "\n";
00135           errstr += String("PERROR frag-") + (*iter).second.fragno +
00136             "\tdistance\t" + (*iter).second.distance + "\n";
00137           errstr += String("PERROR frag-") + (*iter).second.fragno +
00138             "\tsize\t" + (*iter).second.cumulative_size + "\n";
00139         }
00140         errstr += String("PERROR revision ") +
00141           ag_data->earliest_cached_revision + " not found in map\n";
00142         cout << flush << errstr << flush;
00143         trace_str += String("STAT *** This should never happen, ecr = ") +
00144           ag_data->earliest_cached_revision + " ***\n";
00145         continue;
00146       }
00147 
00148       if ((*iter).second.cumulative_size > prune_threshold) {
00149         trace_str += String("STAT ") + ag_data->ag->get_full_name()+" cumulative_size "
00150           + (*iter).second.cumulative_size + " > prune_threshold " + prune_threshold + "\n";
00151 
00152         if (ag_data->mem_used > 0) {
00153           ag_data->ag->set_compaction_bit();
00154           mem_total += ag_data->mem_used;
00155         }
00156 
00157       }
00158       else
00159         trace_str += String("STAT ") + ag_data->ag->get_full_name()+" cumulative_size "
00160           + (*iter).second.cumulative_size + " <= prune_threshold " + prune_threshold + "\n";
00161     }
00162 
00163     if (mem_total > 0) {
00164       stats[i]->priority = Math::log2(mem_total);
00165       stats[i]->needs_compaction = true;
00166     }
00167 
00168     if (!stats[i]->range->is_root()) {
00169       if (stats[i]->table_id == 0 && Global::range_metadata_split_size != 0) {
00170         if (disk_total >= Global::range_metadata_split_size) {
00171           HT_INFOF("Adding maintenance for range %s because disk_total %d exceeds %d",
00172                    stats[i]->range->get_name().c_str(), (int)disk_total, (int)Global::range_metadata_split_size);
00173           stats[i]->priority = 2000 + Math::log2(mem_total);
00174           stats[i]->needs_split = true;
00175         }
00176       }
00177       else {
00178         if (disk_total >= Global::range_split_size) {
00179           HT_INFOF("Adding maintenance for range %s because disk_total %d exceeds %d",
00180                    stats[i]->range->get_name().c_str(), (int)disk_total, (int)Global::range_split_size);
00181           stats[i]->priority = 1000 + Math::log2(mem_total);
00182           stats[i]->needs_split = true;
00183         }
00184       }
00185     }
00186   }
00187 
00188 }
